abstract: In Cainsville, Mo., a dusty, windswept corner of rural America, the New York billionaire J. Christopher Flowers has bought one of the few remaining businesses.

lead_paragraph: In Cainsville, Mo., a dusty, windswept corner of rural America, the New York billionaire J. Christopher Flowers has bought one of the few remaining businesses.

headline.main: Looking for Profit in a Small-Town Bank
